text: But thou shalt not redeem the first-born 18. 17 i. e. among. But μόσχος is used elsewhere in the LXX. for horned cattle old enough to breed.of calves and the first-born of sheep and the first-born of goats; they are holy: and thou shalt pour their blood upon the altar, and thou shalt offer the fat as a burnt-offering for a smell of sweet savour to the Lord.
